title: Ep. 576 - Dismantling The Whole System
description:
Ilhan Omar calls for dismantling the American economy and political systems, Desean Jackson endorses and then disavows Hitler, and liberal squishes can’t pick a side.

Ben's new book "How to Destroy America in Three Easy Steps" is coming out July 21st. Get your signed copy here => https://utm.io/uGvC
